title: Analytics API Routes
description:
Create REST API Routes for Analytics and Dashboard Data

Implement a set of RESTful API endpoints that provide analytics metrics and dashboard data to the frontend application.

Requirements:
- Define clear endpoint structure following REST conventions (e.g., GET /api/analytics/*, GET /api/dashboard/*)
- Implement endpoints for key analytics metrics:
  - User activity statistics
  - Time-series data for charts/graphs
  - Aggregate metrics (totals, averages, trends)
  - Dashboard summary data
- Add query parameter support for filtering:
  - Date range filters (start_date, end_date)
  - Grouping options (by day, week, month)
  - Entity-specific filters (user_id, category, etc.)
- Implement proper authentication and authorization
- Add input validation for query parameters
- Return consistent JSON response structure with appropriate HTTP status codes
- Handle errors gracefully with descriptive error messages
- Consider pagination for large datasets
- Add rate limiting to prevent abuse
- Document endpoints with request/response examples
- Write tests for each endpoint covering success and error cases

Performance Considerations:
- Optimize database queries with appropriate indexes
- Cache frequently requested data
- Consider async processing for expensive computations
